title: baja baja maanasa
sahitya:
bhaja bhaja mAnasa rAghavEndram guru rAghavEndram yati rAghavEndram







anupallavi



tungA nadi tIram puNyasthaLa vAsam mantrAlaya kSEtram brndAvana

vAsam



caraNam



dIna jana priya gAnarasa pUrNam prahlAda avatAram kincita rUpam

phAlguNa sangama guNashIla nAmam mrttika kaliyuga paramauSadam
